short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To prevent malpractice, identifies and blocks third-party browser extensions during tests on the Iamneo portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To uphold the integrity and fairness of the IAMNEO testing environment, we've introduced the extension 'NeoExamShield' to the system. This advanced feature is specifically crafted to recognize and restrict extensions installed on users' devices as they engage in malpractice during exams through our platform.
